posts.post_title: FS T 204 Ramly Nap Rucker, T 207 Sweeney
posts.post_content:
Hey Guys, moving some cards from my collection. Have a really nice T 204 SGC 50 Nap Rucker for sale. If you need to see back scans or any other of my items for sale you can use the Hmurphy collection link at the bottom of the post. Have had many transactions on the 54 and been a member for 10+ years. Just don`t sell often. Pm`s or emails O k,  1`st "i`ll take it" gets it. Thanks for looking.
[URL=http://s179.photobucket.com/user/hughmurphy/media/IMG_0331.jpg.html][IMG]http://i179.photobucket.com/albums/w286/hughmurphy/IMG_0331.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
 Rucker Asking 250.00 OBO ppl F and friends includes Pri/Ins shipping   SOLD, thanks Justin
 Sweeney ( has mark right of bat) asking 35.00 OBO ppl f and friends includes shipping  SOLD, thanks Brian
T 207 Sweeney has been sold, thank you sir !
